text:
As of 9am 19 May, there have been 2,772,552 tests, with 89,784 tests on 18 May. 

248,818 people have tested positive.

As of 5pm on 18 May, of those tested positive for coronavirus, across all settings, 35,341 have sadly died.

More information in the tweet below 🔽 https://t.co/uRtdHU6yU4

entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.
